alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 24 at 6:23PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...Wind Advisory remains in effect... * Trade winds over American Samoa are expected to produce winds up to 30 mph with higher gusts. * TIMING...through Saturday night * IMPACTS...Expect possible downed tree limbs as well as shifting of loose and unsecured small objects due to strong winds. Gusty winds will make driving difficult and may cause hazardous conditions for mariners. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 624 AFIAFI ASO FARAILE IUNI 24 2022 ...O loo faaauau Fautuaga mo Savili Malolosi... * O le a tumau pea le malolosi o savili o le tuaoloa i luga o Amerika Samoa e oo atu i le 30 mph ma e faata`uta`u. * TAIMI...seia oo i le po o le Aso Toona`i * AAFIAGA...E pau`u ai laau lelea ai mea-totino e le`i faamaumauina ma faaleagaina ai apa ma taualuga o fale. Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe ai taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. E sousou foi le sami ona o le malolosi o savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo savili malolosi o lona uiga o savili e 25 i le 30 mph ma e agi faata`uta`u o loo aafia ai le atunuu. O nei savili malolosi o le a faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise lava taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Faamolemole ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 25 to 30 MPH are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Please use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
